name: A pair of soft buckskin gloves
data: It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom an average amount.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'healing efficiency'.
It increases the users poison resistance a bit.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'earth lore'.
